{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\cocoartf1187\cocoasubrtf340 {\fonttbl\f0\fnil\fcharset0 LucidaGrande;} {\colortbl;\red255\green255\blue255;\red0\green0\blue233;} {\*\listtable{\list\listtemplateid1\listhybrid{\listlevel\levelnfc23\levelnfcn23\leveljc0\leveljcn0\levelfollow0\levelstartat1\levelspace360\levelindent0{\*\levelmarker \{disc\}}{\leveltext\leveltemplateid1\'01\uc0\u8226 ;}{\levelnumbers;}\fi-360\li720\lin720 }{\listname ;}\listid1}} {\*\listoverridetable{\listoverride\listid1\listoverridecount0\ls1}} \deftab720 \pard\pardeftab720\sa260
\f0\b\fs40 \cf0 Svensk <-> English\ \pard\pardeftab720\sa200
\b0\fs28 \cf0 Dictionary from Swedish to English and English to Swedish. With the dataset from {\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "http://folkets-lexikon.csc.kth.se/folkets/"}}{\fldrslt \cf2 \ul \ulc2 Folkets lexikon}}. Sourcecode from {\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "http://loessl.org/"}}{\fldrslt \cf2 \ul \ulc2 Christopher Loessl}}\cf2 \ul \ulc2 \
\b \cf0 \ulnone Usage: \b0 \ \pard\tx220\tx720\pardeftab720\li720\fi-720 \ls1\ilvl0\cf0 {\listtext \'95 }Double tab a word with 3 fingers on your track-pad\ {\listtext \'95 }Select a word and press cmd-ctrl-d\ {\listtext \'95 }Use the dictionary application\ {\listtext \'95 }...\ \pard\pardeftab720
\b \cf0 \ License: \b0 \ The People's dictionary is free. Both the whole {\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "file:///Applications/Dictionary.app/Contents/Resources/folkets_en_sv_public.xml"}}{\fldrslt \cf2 \ul English-Swedish dictionary}} and the {\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "file:///Applications/Dictionary.app/Contents/Resources/folkets_sv_en_public.xml"}}{\fldrslt \cf2 \ul Swedish-English dictionary}} can be downloaded for use under the {\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.5/"}}{\fldrslt \cf2 \ul Distributed Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 2.5 Generic license}}.\ The source code to create this dictionary can be found {\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "http://hashier.github.com/MacFolket/"}}{\fldrslt \cf2 \ul here}}.\ Christopher Loessl's homepage can be found {\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "http://loessl.org/"}}{\fldrslt \cf2 \ul here}}.\ }

requirement.message: You need at least 70MB free disk space to install the dictionary
